body_html:
Hi @abhajaswal, yours does not seem to be the same problem. In all other cases, something prompted the following error in java:
java.lang.RuntimeException: Unexpected error: java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException: the trustAnchors parameter must be non-empty

I don't know if what you're getting is an equivalent complaint from the JDK included in the bazel binary, but then, it would be rather weird that they did not include their own certificate in the cacerts... Are you sure you installed bazel using https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/install-ubuntu.html#install-with-installer-ubuntu (i.e., section Installing using binary installer).

Hope this helps.

Hi @abhajaswal, yours does not seem to be the same problem. In all other cases, something prompted the following error in java:
java.lang.RuntimeException: Unexpected error: java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException: the trustAnchors parameter must be non-empty
I don't know if what you're getting is an equivalent complaint from the JDK included in the bazel binary, but then, it would be rather weird that they did not include their own certificate in the cacerts... Are you sure you installed bazel using https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/install-ubuntu.html#install-with-installer-ubuntu (i.e., section Installing using binary installer).
Hope this helps.
body:
Hi @abhajaswal, yours does not seem to be the same problem. In all other cases, something prompted the following error in java:
`java.lang.RuntimeException: Unexpected error: java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException: the trustAnchors parameter must be non-empty` 

I don't know if what you're getting is an equivalent complaint from the JDK included in the bazel binary, but then, it would be rather weird that they did not include their own certificate in the cacerts... Are you sure you installed bazel using https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/install-ubuntu.html#install-with-installer-ubuntu (i.e., section Installing using binary installer). 

Hope this helps.
